name: Mountain Sniper Shooting
description:
Ready to join the new exciting action first person shooter game. Take accurate aiming and shooting. Enjoy the fun of extreme shooting games.

Start fighting, pick up your sniper rifle, aim, hiding enemies behind trees and rocks. Kill every dangerous enemy and become a nemesis of terrorists.

Your main mission in the game is to shoot enemies from afar with your deadly sniper rifle. You have superb shooting skills, you can clear the whole area of the enemy. Show your shooting skills to the world. Become a sniper hero. Remember the is a real war, you have to face the enemy alone. Enjoy the game to bring you the excitement and challenge. I wish you a happy game.

Mountain Sniper Shooting Features:
- HD 3D graphics
- realistic environmental effects
- a variety of deadly sniper rifles
- Simple and smooth control
- Challenging missions
- amazing music and sound effects
- Fast-paced game
